Translations.Text: akasam mariyu ratrivela vacce naksatram (at tarikh) saksiga
ratri vela vaccedi (at tarikh) ante emito niku ela telustundi
adoka atyanta prakasavantamaina naksatram
kanipettukoni undevadu (devaduta) lekunda e vyakti kuda ledu
kavuna manavudu tanu denito srstincabaddado gamanincali
atadu visarjincabade (cim'mukuntu veluvade) dravapadarthanto srstincabaddadu
adi vennu mariyu rom'mu emukala madhyabhagam nundi bayatiki vastundi
niscayanga, ayana (srstikarta), atanini marala bratikinci tegala samarthyam galavadu
e rojayite rahasya visayala vicarana jarugutundo
appudu ataniki (manavuniki) elanti sakti undadu mariyu e sahayakudunu undadu
varsam kuripince akasam saksiga
(cetlu molakettetappudu) cili poye bhumi saksiga
niscayanga, idi (i khur'an, satyasatyalanu) veru parace vakku (giturayi)
mariyu idi vrtha kalaksepaniki vaccinadi kadu
(o muham'mad!) Niscayanga, varu (niku virud'dhanga) kutrapannutunnaru
mariyu nenu kuda pannagam pannutunnanu
kanuka nivu satyatiraskarulaku konta vyavadhi nivvu! Vari patla mrduvuga vyavaharincu
atyunnatudaina ni prabhuvu namanni stutincu
ayane (pratidanini) srstincadu mariyu tagina pramananlo rupondincadu
mariyu ayane dani prakrti laksanalanu nirnayincadu, mariyu margam cupadu
Mariyu ayane paccikanu molipimpa jesadu
marala danini nallani cettacedaranga cesadu
memu niceta (khur'an nu) cadivimpa jestamu, taruvata nivu (danini) maracipovu
allah korindi tappa! Niscayanga, bahiranganga unnadi mariyu gopyanga unnadi anni ayanaku baga telusu
mariyu memu ni marganni sulabham ceyadaniki niku saulabhyanni kalugajestamu
kavuna nivu hitopadesam cestu undu; variki hitopadesam labhadayakam kavaccu
(allah ku) bhayapade vadu hitopadesanni svikaristadu
mariyu daurbhagyudu daniki duramai potadu
alanti vade ghoramaina narakagnilo padi kalutadu
appudu, atadu andulo cavanu ledu, bratakanu ledu
susilatanu (pavitratanu) patince vadu tappaka saphalyam pondutadu
mariyu tana prabhuvu namanni smaristu, namaj cestu undevadu
